page.content: 2. Fife Fashion Ltd.(Kilt and Skirt makers) Fife Fashion was set up in June 1983 by a number of men and women who had been made redundant. They pooled their redundancy money and with the help of a grant set themselves up as Lady skirts and kilt makers. They chose a sight in Cardenden as most of the members of the co-operative lived there. At present their are 13 members of the co-operative, 8 are from Cardenden, 4 from Kirkcaldy and 1 from Dunfermline. It is too soon to ivaluate how succesful they will be but the workforce feel confident they will soon be able to expand and to take on some of the unemployed teenagers from the area.
